channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The EV Buyers’ Guide to an Uncertain Future
item.description: The Trump administration is likely to make big changes to US federal electric vehicle incentive programs. Buy or lease now, probably.

item.title: eBay Coupon Code: 10% Off Select Items in November 2024
item.description: Get 10% off select products and enjoy other great deals at eBay this November.

item.title: Texas AG opens investigation into advertising group that Elon Musk sued for ‘boycotting’ X
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton announced on Thursday he is opening an investigation into the World Federation of Advertisers (WFA) to determine whe...

item.title: Exclusive Nectar Coupon Code: 40% Off November 2024
item.description: Get 40% off mattresses, pillows, bed frames, and more with our WIRED exclusive Nectar promo code for November 2024.

item.title: American Airlines is deploying new tech to shame boarding line cutters
item.description: American Airlines has a new tactic for shaming boarding line cutters: A loud beeper. CNBC reports that the airline is rolling out a system that emits ...

item.title: OnePlus Promo Code: 20% Off in November 2024
item.description: Save 20% with a OnePlus coupon this November, plus save up to 10% on earbuds, phones, and more.

item.title: Flipkart co-founder Binny Bansal leaves PhonePe board

item.title: $10 OFF Walmart Promo Codes - November 2024
item.description: Score $10 off your first three pickup or delivery orders with our Walmart coupon or choose from 1,000s of flash deals this holiday season, up to 65% o...

item.title: A company is now developing human washing machines

item.title: New UK crypto regulations will include stablecoins and staking services
